title: Emergency Flood Relief for Sylhet Communities
description: Urgent assistance needed for flood-affected families in Sylhet division. Providing emergency food, clean water, and temporary shelter materials.

title: Education Support for Underprivileged Children - Chittagong
description: Help provide books, school supplies, and uniforms for children from low-income families in Chittagong division. Supporting 200+ students.

title: Winter Clothing Drive for Rangpur District
description: Collecting warm clothes and blankets for elderly and homeless people in Rangpur division during the harsh winter season.

title: Clean Water Initiative for Rural Rajshahi
description: Installing tube wells and water purification systems in remote villages of Rajshahi division to provide safe drinking water.

title: Medical Equipment for Barisal General Hospital
description: Fundraising to purchase essential medical equipment and supplies for the understaffed hospital serving Barisal division.

title: Khulna Mangrove Forest Conservation Project
description: Environmental conservation effort to protect and restore mangrove forests in Khulna division, supporting local ecosystems.

title: Emergency Healthcare for Rohingya Refugees - Cox's Bazar
description: Providing essential medical care, medicines, and health services for Rohingya refugee families in Cox's Bazar camps.

title: Old Age Home Support - Dhaka Division
description: Supporting elderly residents with medical care, nutritious meals, and recreational activities in old age homes across Dhaka division.

title: Cyclone Recovery Fund - Coastal Barisal
description: Emergency response fund for cyclone-affected coastal communities in Barisal division. Rebuilding homes and livelihoods.

title: Digital Literacy Program for Rural Mymensingh
description: Teaching computer skills and digital literacy to youth in rural areas of Mymensingh division to improve employment opportunities.

title: Women's Empowerment Microfinance - Sylhet
description: Providing small loans and business training to women entrepreneurs in tea garden communities of Sylhet division.

title: Street Children Rehabilitation - Dhaka
description: Comprehensive program providing shelter, education, and vocational training for street children in Dhaka division.

title: Agricultural Equipment for Farmers - Rangpur
description: Purchasing modern farming equipment and tools for small-scale farmers in Rangpur division to increase crop productivity.

title: Mental Health Support Center - Rajshahi
description: Establishing a community mental health center providing counseling and psychiatric care in Rajshahi division.

title: Disaster Preparedness Training - Khulna Coastal Areas
description: Training coastal communities in Khulna division on disaster preparedness, early warning systems, and emergency response.
